name: Agent Hos Year 3080
description:
WASD -> move up,left,down,right

Theme: There has been  a chaos in your  weapon system due to time travel.Hence the weapons change RANDOMLY without prior imitation.

Story:You are in the year 3080 and only a handful of humans remain.You have been given the responsibility by the FBI to detonate the deadliest Nuclear bomb of the past (2080) because of which the humans have become extinct.

But because of time travelling there has been a chaos in the entropy of your weapons and hence they change randomly without order.Detonate the bomb guarded by weird species and save the future!

Creators:

Terminated Red - https://terminatedred.itch.io/
